resources.string: Instrument theme is linked with driving mode
When the video safety mode is enabled and the \n vehicle speed is more than 15km/h, some videos \n will be automatically turned off.
Please set the passenger\'s common position and welcome position first
After opening, please pay attention to the safety of the passengers in the rear row when the front passenger seat moves
When the vehicle is swayed or towed beyond the \n set warning distance, the owner \n will be reminded by SMS。
Monitor the vehicle electric energy consumption, and manage \n the comfort functions of the vehicle (air conditioner, large \n screen, etc.) in the low power state。
Please go to the official designated \n maintenance as soon as possible
Unable to receive relevant reminders when the vehicle is towed
Foreign metal object detected, please remove
Wireless charging temperature is too high, please remove the phone
The window closes automatically on rainy
After the function is opened, the \n Windows of the four doors can be \n closed/opened remotely by the key

In OFF state, when the rain sensor detects rain 
 and the window/sunroof is open, the 
 window/sunroof is automatically closed; 
 If the window or sunroof is opened manually 
 within a power-on period, the window or 
 sunroof is not closed automatically.
 Function is retained for 24 hours.
When the function is opened and the \n door is locked, the four door windows, \n sunroof and sun blind automatically close

When maintaining windshield wipers, be sure to turn on the 
 wiper maintenance mode. Turn on the wiper for maintenance 
 and the wiper will automatically 
 run to the maintenance position.
When carrying the smart key close to or\n away from the vehicle for a certain distance\n , the door will automatically unlock or lock.
The door smart entry switch needs to turn on
Keep unlocking with the key in the unlocking area
Complete the exit and entry action to unlock with the key

Trip type：Carry a legal smart key 
 into the trunk sensing area, exit 
 the area, enter the b area again, 
 and the electric tailgate will be 
 opened automatically；
 Stay type：Carry a legal smart key 
 into the trunk sensing area,
 stay in place for more than 6s, 
 and the electric tailgate 
 will be opened automatically.

Suggestions on electric tailgate hight adjustment：
 for users with a height of less than 1.6 meters, 
 it is recommended to open 80 degrees of the height; 
 For users 1.6-1.7 meters tall, the recommended 
 opening height is 90 degrees; For users with a height 
 of more than 1.7 meters, 100 degrees height is recommended.
 Relevant height adjustment suggestions are for reference only
Please adjust physical button on the door
Automatically save the current position after \n the 2 minutes countdown

Please adjust the physical button on 
 the door to complete the setting 
 within 2 minutes, and then save 
 the current position after the 2 
 minute countdown
Full speed range to provide the driver with vehicle control assistance
Warn the driver when a forward warning collision risk is detected
A short brake occurs when a dangerous condition is detected
Please turn on or off the lane assignment function at the air conditioning panel
Alert drivers to traffic coming behind
Open the door early warning DOW
Recognize approaching target and give warning when door is opened
Provide the driver\'s right visual blind area image information
Automatic switch of near and far light
Detect speed limit signs above or beside the road
Turning off the automatic emergency braking \n function will also turn off the integrated \n cruise assist function. Are you sure do it?
Detect obstacles when reversing at low speed and take braking actions if necessary

After powering off, the low 
 beam lamp will light up for some 
 time and then go out,Illuminate 
 the way home for you.
Number of turn signal flashing when lane change
Turn on or off backlight brightness
Door open warning to behind coming car
Save the setting items in the current theme, and synchronize \n the setting results when change theme
At low volume, enhance the bass and treble; \n Conversely, at high volume, lower the bass \n and treble to equalize the loudness

The switching condition is not met. Please check whether the following conditions are met： 
 1.Engine is started 
 2.At a safe speed 
 3.Please read the vehicle manual for other conditions

The intelligent cruise assist system (IACC) provides the driver with longitudinal and transverse assistance of the vehicle in the full speed range (0~150km/h).The longitudinal assistance is realized by the adaptive cruise control system ACC, which controls the vehicle to cruise with the front vehicle in the range of 0~150km/h, or to cruise at a constant speed in the range of 30~150km/h. The time distance between vehicle and the front vehicle can also be set. IACC will preferentially enter the horizontal auxiliary control by identifying the clear lane lines on both sides of the lane. At this time, IACC is in the lane line control mode, and the instrument IACC icon is displayed as green, while the lane line is displayed as blue. When the speed is lower than 60km/h, if the lane line is not identified, you can also follow the identified front vehicle. At this time, the IACC is in the following vehicle control mode, the instrument IACC icon displays green, and the front vehicle displays blue.The intelligent cruise assist system is a driving assistance function, which does not allow the driver to drive off-hand. The system covers all driving scenes, traffic, weather and road conditions. Even if the system is activated, the driver must drive carefully and abide by traffic rules

Forward collision warning FCW detects vehicle and pedestrian targets through radar and camera. When a potential collision risk between the self vehicle and the vehicle, pedestrian or other objects in front is detected, an audible and visual alarm will be issued to remind the driver. The forward collision warning system includes safety distance alarm, pre alarm and emergency alarm functions. In the process of driving, if the self vehicle follows closely for a long time, the system will send out a safety distance alarm and the instrument will prompt the driver that the self vehicle is too close to the vehicle in front. In the process of driving, when there is a risk of collision between the self vehicle and the vehicle in front of it, the system will give an early warning in visual and auditory ways, the combination instrument will prompt the information, and sound the alarm at the same time. The driver shall take appropriate actions in time to ensure a safe driving distance. After the pre alarm, if the driver still does not respond, the emergency alarm will be triggered, and the system will apply a short brake. In some emergencies, the pre alarm may be skipped and the emergency alarm may be triggered directly. The driver should not rely too much on the system, and should not deliberately test or wait for the trigger of the system. Due to the inherent limitations of the system, false triggering cannot be completely avoided.

The emergency brake AEB is used to enter the active brake in case of emergency, to help the driver avoid collision or reduce the injury caused by collision. When the system detects that there is a danger of collision with the vehicle or pedestrian in front and it is very urgent, if the driver has taken braking actions, but the braking force is insufficient, the AEB system will provide the remaining braking force to achieve the best target braking force to avoid or reduce the injury caused by the collision; If the driver does not take braking actions, the system will automatically apply the brake within its ability to avoid or reduce the injury caused by collision. It should be noted that the AEB system is a kind of auxiliary function for the driver. Don\'t risk driving. The driver must keep the control of the vehicle and take full responsibility for the vehicle. Moreover, due to the inherent limitations of the system, under some complex conditions, the system may misidentify vehicles and pedestrians, causing unnecessary braking.

When the self driving speed is above 60 km/h, the lane assist system detects the lane line through the camera to provide the driver with lateral assistance of vehicles, including Lane Departure Warning System (LDW), Lane Keep Assist System (LKS), and Road Departure Assist System (RDP). The driver can choose different systems according to his driving habits. Lane Departure Warning System (LDW) When it detects that a vehicle is deviating from the lane and the driver has no intention to change lanes, the system will give a visual and audible alarm to warn the driver that the vehicle is deviating from the lane. It should be noted that the system only provides alarm function and does not provide steering assistance. Lane Keeping Assist System (LKS) assists the driver to keep the vehicle driving in the middle of the lane by applying steering anticipation. Road Departure Assist System (RDP) When it detects that the vehicle is about to depart from the lane and the driver has no intention to change lanes, the system will assist the driver to keep the vehicle in the lane by applying steering intervention. If the vehicles continue to deviate from the lane line, the lane departure warning will be triggered at the same time. It should be noted that this system only serves as an auxiliary function and cannot replace the driver\'s control. When the camera is covered, or the vehicle is in the backlight, glare, night and other environments, the system may exit for a short time, or there may be false alarm or missing alarm. Road construction, ponding on the road surface, cracks on the road surface or unclear markings may also lead to the camera being unable to detect the lane lines, resulting in false or missing reports.

The intelligent high beam lamp assists(HMA) to judge the current driving environment through the camera when the self driving speed is more than 40km/h. When the vehicle lighting is turned on to AUTO, it controls the automatically switching between the low beam and the high beam. The system can identify whether there are other vehicles in the opposite direction and the same direction in the front, and switch the lower beam and high beam modes according to the situation. Even after the function is turned on, the driver can manually switch the high beam lamp and low beam lamp. It should be noted that this system is an auxiliary function, which cannot guarantee that it can adapt to all driving conditions. If the camera is blocked, this function will not work or the performance will be degraded.

The speed limit reminder (TSR) camera detects the speed limit signs on or near the road and displays them on the instrument to help the driver observe the speed limit signs. It should be noted that this system is an auxiliary function, which cannot guarantee that it can adapt to all driving conditions. If the camera is blocked, this function will not work or the performance will be degraded

DOW, namely Door Open Warning function, which can monitor the rear side of the vehicle through left and right rear three-way cameras when the vehicle is parked. Mobile objects in this area are detected and tracked, and different alarm modes are triggered according to the response of users, so as to avoid possible security accidents

When the blind spot detection BSD monitors the blind area behind the side through the camera when the self vehicle speed is more than 30km/h. When there is a driving vehicle, the blind area monitoring indicator in the corresponding side exterior rearview mirror will be on for a long time. In this case, the driver turns on the turn signal on the corresponding side, the indicator will flash, and the instrument will give an alarm to the driver. It should be noted that this system is only used to supplement the deficiencies of the rearview mirror. It is not a driving safety system and cannot guarantee that it is applicable to all driving situations. In addition, when the camera is covered by rain, snow, mud, etc., or in the night, rain, snow, fog, shadow environment, there will be missing or false alarms.

When the driver makes a left (or right) lane change or overtaking, the blind spot camera can provide the driver with a blind spot image of the rear left(or rear right) of the vehicle to assist the driver in driving safely. It should be noted that this system is only used to supplement the deficiencies of the rearview mirror, and it is not a driving safety system, which cannot guarantee that it is applicable to all driving situations. In addition, when the camera is covered by rain, snow, mud, etc., or in the night, rain, snow, fog, shadow environment, this function will not be available or its performance will reduce.

Low speed emergency braking MEB monitors the obstacles behind through the rear parking radar. When the self owned vehicle is backing up at the speed of 0-9km/h, if a collision is about to occur as monitored by the radar, it will automatically control the emergency braking of the vehicle. It should be noted that this system is an auxiliary function. When the radar detects railings, trees, slopes, or noises close to the radar operating frequency band, the system may be triggered by mistake. When the radar surface is dirty, the system may be triggered by mistake or not.
The battery is low, and some comfort functions will be turned off
The battery is low, and the central control screen is about to close
Your car will automatically shut down in 5 minutes
Please start the engine to avoid battery loss
Battery charge is too low, some comfort and entertainment functions will be turned off
The door opening alarm DOW is disable
Intelligent high beam auxiliary HMA signal error
